AGS Mine Monitor and Surveillance, Yukon.

This solicitation is selectively tendered to supply arrangement holders under the EW479-192534 request for supply arrangement (RFSA) for remediation construction services for northern contaminated sites and based in the Yukon administrative zone administrative zone.  The bid solicitation process is outlined in Part 6 Supply Arrangement and Resulting Contract Clauses, B. Bid Solicitation.

Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC) is inviting the following supply arrangement holders to bid:

# Government Tender Announcement for AGS Mine Surveillance and Monitoring

## Tender Title and Details

* **English Title**: AGS Mine Surveillance and Monitoring
* **French Title**: Surveillance et contrôle de la mine AGS
* **Reference Number**: PW-_NCS-030-12336
* **Amendment Number**: 0
* **Solicitation Number**: EW699-231360/A
* **Publication Date**: October 24, 2022
* **Tender Closing Date**: October 26, 2022, at 15:00:00

## Tender Status

* **English Status**: Expired
* **French Status**: Expiré

## Procurement Details

* **GSIN**: *E108F (Northern Contaminated Site Environmental Clean-up Work/Services)
* **Procurement Category**: *SRV (Service)
* **Trade Agreements**: NONE
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Selective Tendering

## Requirement Details

* **End Use**: AGS Mine, Yukon
* **Objective**: Complete monthly environmental monitoring and site inspections
* **Requirement**: Subject to The Carcross/Tagish First Nation Final Agreement and The Tlicho Land Claims and Self-Government Agreement

## Tendering Procedures

* **Notice Type**: Request for Proposal
* **Selection Criteria**: Highest Combined Rating of Technical Merit and Price
* **Documents**: May be submitted in either official language of Canada

## Contracting Entity Details

* **Name**: Public Works and Government Services Canada
* **Address**: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec K1A 0S5, Canada
* **Contact Person**: Monnette Calixto, monnette.calixto@pwgsc-tpsgc.gc.ca, (204) 899-9768

## Notice

This is to provide notification of the subject solicitation. The Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement. Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.

## Tender Status Summary

The tender is expired; however, suppliers without a supply arrangement may take advantage of the ongoing opportunity for qualification at https://canadabuys.canada.ca/en/tender-opportunities/tender-notice/pw-ncs-014-11619. The selected contract will be subject to The Carcross/Tagish First Nation Final Agreement and The Tlicho Land Claims and Self-Government Agreement
